code: export var ADD_TO_WATCHLIST="ADD_TO_WATCHLIST";export var REMOVE_FROM_WATCHLIST="REMOVE_FROM_WATCHLIST";export var NEXT_MOVIE="NEXT_MOVIE";export var PREVIOUS_MOVIE="PREVIOUS_MOVIE";export var BACK_TO_TOP="BACK_TO_TOP";export var SUGGEST_MOVIE="SUGGEST_MOVIE";export var addToWatchlist=function addToWatchlist(movie){return{type:ADD_TO_WATCHLIST,payload:movie};};export var removeFromWatchlist=function removeFromWatchlist(id){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_WATCHLIST,payload:id};};export var nextMovie=function nextMovie(){return{type:NEXT_MOVIE};};export var previousMovie=function previousMovie(){return{type:PREVIOUS_MOVIE};};export var backToTop=function backToTop(){return{type:BACK_TO_TOP};};export var suggestMovie=function suggestMovie(){return{type:SUGGEST_MOVIE};};
